entries.start_convo_4: I guess you have a signal you want me to pay attention to?
entries.end_convo: If you really want me to, then I'll do it.
entries.command_reply_1: I need to teach you a command.
entries.start_convo_2: You mean I have to listen to you too? Well, fine. What do you want me to learn?
entries.which_command: What command do you want to teach me about then?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
entries.pet_wounded_health: Did you know droids felt pain? I've recently discovered that myself.
entries.pet_wounded_mind: I hope my positrons stay aligned after all this abuse.
